title: Katy Perry SWEARS live on TV during Grammy Awards red carpet interview - then apologises to her mum and dad
text:

Katy Perry has just made her big comeback with a brand new single - and it looks like she's making sure she returns with quite the bang. 
The pop star was being interview by E! host Ryan Seacrest ahead of the Grammy Awards on Sunday when she accidentally let a swear word slip. 
She said: "I just feel a little bit more conscious than I ever have. I kind of worked out some of my sh*t..." 
Katy might have been able to get away with it - especially as E! cut the sound just in time - if it wasn't for the fact she then apologised to her parents. 
"Sorry, I'm live. I still couldn't stop swearing. Sorry mum and dad." (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
The 32-year-old also spoke to Ryan about her break from music, telling him it was a much-needed time out for her. 
"There was a pause in the music for a little while," Ryan said. 
"Yeah that's called taking care of your mental health," Katy replied.
